section.name: Installing the plugin into IntelliJ IDEA

p.b: NOTE: Automatic installation of the Mevenide IDEA integration is not yet possible, as no version has been released yet. Once versions start rolling out, they will also be added to IDEA's plugin repository.

subsection.name: Manual installation
subsection.p:
To manually install the plugin, please follow these steps:
Download the plugin
Shutdown IDEA.
Extract it right into your plugins directory. This directory is located either in your home directory (on Windows - C:\Documents and Settings\Joe or ~/joe on Linux/UNIX) under .IntelliJ/config or in your IntelliJ installation directory. If both exist, use the one in your home directory.
Start IDEA again.

subsection.name: Automatic installation
subsection.p:
Installing Mevenide IDEA is done via the IDEA plugins manager:
Open the Settings window (from the toolbar, or press CTRL+ALT+S)
Click the Plugins icon to open the plugin manager:
Click the Available tag, to download the list of available plugins, then, search for the Mevenide IDEA Integration plugin in the list. Once you've found it - right click it and select Download and install plugin.
IDEA will notify you that you have to restart it in order to activate the plugin (answering Yes will close IDEA for you, but you need to start IDEA manually).
